Function to create a loadings file from the factanal() output

Source: R/extract_fa_loads.R
extract_fa_loads.Rd

Function to create a loadings file from the factanal() output

extract_fa_loads(fa_object)

Arguments

fa_object

factanal() model

Examples

fa_output <- factanal(tidyr::drop_na(psych::bfi), factors = 6)
extract_fa_loads(fa_output)
